turkish_example_sentence: Siz o aceleci tıbbi müdahaleyi yapmamış olsaydınız, hasta daha iyi iyileşirdi
english_example_sentence: If you had not made that hasty medical intervention, the patient would have recovered better
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не сделали то поспешное медицинское вмешательство, пациент выздоровел бы лучше
